column2: The petitioner entered into the lease agreements marked A3 and A4 on
the strength of the order made by the Minister in charge in the Gazette marked
A2 vesting the ownership of the said lands on the first and  second  respondent
corporations thus legitimate expectations have been borne in the petitioner that

column1: the land will not be re-vested.

column2: For the afore stated reasons I decide to allow the petitioner's application
as prayed for in  prayer (b) and (c) of the petition. The petitioner's application is
JUDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL
